channel.title: Twitter / djcp
channel.description: Twitter updates from Daniel Collis Puro / djcp.

item.title: djcp: @csoghoian @BrookingsInst and the clipboard as well, presumably. #security #keylogging

item.title: djcp: @slicehost STL migration got me disks that are twice as fast and a CPU upgrade to boot. Nice. Almost no down-time.
